events.response_preview: I want to hike everyday in nature and see beautiful views
I want to stay in a nice hotel and chill
I want to eat really good pasta in Italy
I mainly want to move my body, it makes me feel good. Everything else is a bonus for me.
All of the above. As long as there is a pool and breakfast, I'm good
I want to eat really good, authentic food.
As long as I come back to the hotel and have some time in the pool, I'm good

events.option: 1. Northern Italy: Dolomites & Lake Region Adventure
1. Northern Italy: Dolomites & Lake Region Adventure
3. High-End Wellness & Activity Resort in a Scenic Locale

questions.309157b2-8208-4f8f-be21-c0a4c2726297: Gaya, you've expressed a strong desire for daily hiking, nature, and beautiful views. Could you tell me a bit more about what makes a hiking experience truly fulfilling for you? For instance, is the duration of the hike most important, the type of scenery, or perhaps the feeling of accomplishment? Understanding this will help us identify locations that could offer a balance of active exploration alongside other group interests.
questions.d269babd-f9f5-4b94-b37b-4533f96039e0: Adi, your preference for staying in a nice hotel and 'chilling' is clear. When you think about 'chilling,' what does that ideally look like for you? Is it lounging by a pool, enjoying spa services, or simply having a comfortable base to return to after some light exploration? This helps us understand how to integrate comfort and ease into the overall trip plan, ensuring everyone feels refreshed.
questions.9f972c4a-e86c-4381-a62f-d0af627d1cc6: Eyal, you've highlighted a specific interest in culinary experiences, particularly enjoying good pasta in Italy. Could you elaborate on what makes a culinary experience truly memorable for you? Is it the specific type of cuisine, the atmosphere of the dining, or perhaps the cultural immersion that comes with it? Understanding the depth of this interest helps us ensure that the chosen destination can satisfy diverse palettes and provide enriching cultural elements.

final_decision.winner: 1. Northern Italy: Dolomites & Lake Region Adventure

options.title: 1. Northern Italy: Dolomites & Lake Region Adventure
options.description: This option focuses on a region like the Italian Dolomites or the Italian Lakes (e.g., Lake Garda or Como area). It offers breathtaking mountain trails and natural beauty for hiking, combined with charming towns known for excellent regional Italian cuisine. Many hotels in these areas are high-quality, often featuring pools, spa facilities, and good breakfast options.

options.title: 2. European City Base with Nature & Culinary Excursions
options.description: This solution involves selecting a charming European city (e.g., Innsbruck in Austria, Salzburg with nearby lakes/mountains, or a base in Tuscany like Florence or Siena). The group would stay in a well-appointed hotel within the city, using it as a hub. Specific days would be dedicated to guided or independent nature excursions and hikes in the surrounding areas, while others would focus on exploring the city's vibrant food scene and providing relaxation time.

options.title: 3. High-End Wellness & Activity Resort in a Scenic Locale
options.description: This option suggests a high-end wellness or activity-focused resort situated in a beautiful natural setting (e.g., Austrian Alps, Swiss Alps, certain regions of Slovenia, or a luxury ranch/resort in a scenic US location). Such resorts typically offer a wide array of activities including guided hikes, excellent spa facilities (with pools), high-quality dining, and often bespoke culinary experiences or cooking classes.
